q: Page replaces Google CEO Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said Page would "merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly." I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Eric Schmidt wrote. "Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead." The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. "You know, I love Eminem but... Charlotte. The 49ers neutralized Tu Holloway , a player of the year candidate, and handed the Musketeers their first A-10 loss, 66-62.
